expensive, lyft is way cheaper and more convenient.
Don't.use it so don't know nothing.

Really a Bad app if u are choosing a electronic payment options, almost all drivers declined it Pathetic experience
Fare to Delhi airport was shown as Rs 215 all inclusive. But actually got charged Rs. 365. Very misleading!
Did not service area and should have said so. Will never use service Will use Lyft instead.
driver never arrived at the pickup location despite calling him and I was charged the waiting feed without benefitting of the actual service... very dissapointing...

the app is crappy. there is no way to soeak to customer service and when calling I get a message that my number is not connected to a premium account and I should use the help feature in the app which sucks! the map does not work. said someone had picked me up when they had not, charged my card for the ride and now it will take 5 days for the refund. crappy uber!
not bad, but he was creepy
uber auto drivers asking CASH only . paytm not accepting this is problem . when we book auto itscancelling auto and they are calling again asking cash mode direct

uber auto drivers not acceptting trip problem. they are asking CASH only . paytm not accepting this is problem . when we book auto itscancelling auto and they are calling again asking cash mode direct
Trying to use to rent scooter in Venice. No option although everything says to use the app to rent.
app doest work, lost a customer
unable to login to your app
worst app again n again i have to enter my no otp name unable to login
this app is best app but my 2triq and 4triq is very bad my. phon show 109 but drivers phon show 151 it so diffrent.

The app has a lot of errors that allows uber & the drivers to abuse and make false charges to the customer. The app will say 6min till your ride is there and then the driver will already be there, wait less than a min and cancel your ride which charges you, then uber ignores disputes to get your money back. I have literally tried to wave down drivers, messaged them, and even had a driver cancel right as i was getting in the car and almost run over my feet. When i reported it uber did nothing.
I have forgotten password and i am not able to get it back please help
after booking the cab if driver cancel the booking. amounts was automatically ditect
Now I cant login again
i need to sign up

1st there is no one to speak to. That is a problem when the person that was supposed to pick you up don't. But you then get charged a $5 dollar fee because they didn't pick you up. Im beyond upset. Update: Are customers being charged extra to unload the trunk? I was quoted one price, then charged something seperate. Each time I start to use this company again, something always happen.

I've been a customer for the past 4 years loyal to them they have been doing many updates on their service first started off with u have to walk to your pool ride sometimes they ask you to walk almost three blocks and you not even aware of the area you in if you would have baby in the car they don't care, they leaving you far off and at the end they still pass the same area were u originally wanted to be dropped off at top it off now they want you to fill a cash of 25$ to get a ride for 8$
Driver Alvin was very professional and courteous. been trying to set up a ride for 12/29 but having trouble
I was expecting high expectations from uber customer service 24/7 but i didn't, i contacted one agent but never respond within a hour, and frustrated with a outstanding payment i have to deal with
uber sucks sick I have plenty money in the bank and it rejected my card. thanks uber I will now drive drunk.
I have not used it for long time but cant get it to work on my new phone because I dont have my old expired cc card info. Lame.
why is it so heavy but cannot be moved to sd card?
Best service for ride.
can i pay for others sldv jvh c. vvhn
Worst app ever ...i will never use it now

Left me stranded, could not call for an Uber. On their own the app and the website suddenly stopped recognizing my registered cell phone number. I'm locked out of the app. Using Lyft while Uber fixes this problem.
freeze too much in my s9 plus. sometimes driver doesn't show on map or his location get freezes. trying alternative because of poor support.
sign me up to get rides

Left a bag in an Uber, couldn't reach driver b/c my phone number "isn't associated with my account or Caller ID cannot be verified." No response from chat support and I had a flight to catch so I wound up leaving the bag behind. Will be taking taxis in the future until support actually works. Update: After posting this my driver did find me on his own recognizance and return the bag, but I am still annoyed that a mysterious technical issue left me uncertain if I would get it back. Rider beware.
I really loved the app and used it often, I mistakenly logged out and I can't log in again, I trued with my other number but I still can't log in. can I get any help ?
the security feature where they make you pick out buses and traffic lights in order to sign up is ridiculously tedious. I couldn't even sign up because of it. I'm using lyft exclusively from now on

Useless when trying to schedule a ride in Advance with uber SELECT or van. Also cannot see an option to request baby seat for my trip. Found some info o about uber family profiles but it's nowhere to be found in the app. Terrible experience and will pick regular taxi or my taxi instead

Originally worked fine with credit card, then the app began asking to scan credit card and it wont work - I have a Samsung Note 9 and have scanned credit cards with other programs so now I have Uber credit I can't use and can not use the service. Uber customer support has yet to get back to me to respond to the technical issue.
nobody ever showed up got charged 5$ both times i tryd .

had ordered for 2chicken tandoori Biryani and 1special boneless chicken Biryani. received 2 tandoori chicken Biryani not cooked well and 1 boneless chicken Biryani without pieces. now how can I start trusting all your restaurant as i dont have better work to call and fight
app is complete trash, always taking my driver to another block far from where im at plus uber cash isnt working.
i use uber nearly every day seems lately theyve upped the price drastically what was apways a 8-9 dollar commute is now no less the $16???! becoming a rip off. use lift or something else
I can't login, it keeps saying "something went wrong, try again later"
I can't select uber rikshaw option wht is uber go is automated?

I use uber A LOT & I USED TO love it!Lately I have noticed that the arrival time is inaccurate it'll say 3min and will stay that way for 6 or more min. I usually use UberX, but sometimes do pool. the new upgrade for pool is HORRIBLE. I hate that you can't get picked up directly anymore but have to walk (if we wanted to walk we would be taking the bus!) And if you turn of walking the price is almost the same as uberX. And I feel like uber x prices have increased. BRING THE OLD VERSION BACK!!!!!!!
because i can't open this app, not left the option (I'm not a robot). don't stop to see pictures and ain't next, the principal, that's ask a uber drive.
bakwaas app dont waste your mobile storage on this app
most disgusting app ever, not a user friendly app even for techies too.
my driver forgot to end the trip and I got charged $136 for a 10 minute ride. to make it better no one from Uber has responded to my help messages
I did not go to king of Prussia mall. I went from 116 Eagle stream.drive to.valley forge casino end of trip please correct.
Not a good app useless... too many issues in app..

app doesnt work, website doesnt work, and customer support doesnt work. account has been disabled for a month without any progress from customer support other then. tell us how this is happening. oh did you try loging in? it doesnt work? oh.
i try to order uber for my friend different location isn't working also i try to canceled didn't give you option unless charge you

they deactivate driver accounts because of some small things and they don't think that this driver need to this job and should pay his bills... for this company just passenger is important because they pay money to company... a lot of app issues, app is not safe for driver and make him confused. app design and functionality is like student projects. they are not good humans. i wish them to lose their Business and go out of business.
it won't let me past my password to start working it says something went wrong and it won't let me move forward!!

Horrible service they are providing...... Drivers are allowed to cancel the trip as per their needs..... We have so emple time to try finding rides again and again..... At the once we get a ride, the smart driver tries to dodge us by saying in the middle of the trip that vehicle cannot be used further..... Cheaters in short
Map quality sucks. You have to buy maps because this app cannot use free Google maps but charges you for the maps which Google offers for free.
everytime I stop the map flips 180¡ã tried every setting and cannot find a solution, once this is fixed 5 star rating from this guy. This is with the pro version
program works great and great tech support aswell
this app would be perfect if it had tizen / galaxy watch functionality I know it used to for android wear . shame

This app saved my life! I was at 2400m on the mountains, it was very very foggy, the path was not clearly marked, it was freezing and getting dark. But I followed the route showed on the map (which was very very accurate) and in the end I reached the hut. Fully recommend it, and never go on mountains without such an app or other gps.

I like how it works, good map integration for planning and if you pre dl the tiles, fine for off the grid hiking.   However, the app keeps turning itself on to probably communicate something with 'home'  and draining my phone battery so I uninstalled it. too bad.
Dirtbikers will love this app I use it to record my rides and it works amazing!!! Dont leave home without it. It does it all!!!

Best navigation for ATV dirtbike riders. Exactly what I needed. Finally a company to get it right. All the tracks and way points display with names if needed. Has a bunch of different icons. I use ble green red diamond for difficulty reading. Tracks never glitch and zigzag. Always perfect!!!

Great for backpacking! No longer need to buy a Garmin or whatever. I put my phone in airplane mode, turn on GPS when needed and bring a backup battery. Lasts me several days of backpacking! Amazing!!!

Only been using it for about a month. Still getting used to where to find features. There are a fair amount of maps available online and downloading sections for off line viewing is pretty good once you get used to it.  I have found that it's easy to get lost around the map center if you are viewing a section that is not immediately in your area.  Trying to stay zoomed to the right section can be tricky.  I do wish there was a way to find GPX files easily in an organized fashion as well as to easily upload GPX files to a share site that I create.  If there was an easy way to crowd source GPX files and share with each other, that would make this a 5 star app. I know the developer is working on a new app but I'm not a fan of subscription models, I've already got enough people reaching into my pocket on a monthly or yearly basis, I don't need more. So far, it has been pretty good as a tool for taking off roading though.
Depth of settings is why ive been a die hard BCN user. I love the software. I use onx during the hunting season. Land ownership data is key.

I first tried BCN when I was climbing an obscure pinnacle in California that is unofficially known as ¡°Cartago Peak.¡±  Despite having almost no idea how to use BCN or the borrowed phone, I managed to find the tricky route to the summit AND the way back to my car.  I was sold on BCN.  I bought my first smartphone and I¡¯ve been using BCN for all my mountaineering trips ever since.  I create a .GPX file with my route and important waypoints using CalTopo.  Then I load that file into the phone and import it into BCN.  I download CalTopo maps before leaving, and use BCN to help navigate in the wilderness.  I drop a few breadcrumbs along the way to make sure I can find the way back to my camp or my car.  After 30+ years using a map and compass, BCN is pretty intuitive.  It¡¯s like a map, only MUCH better.  The GPS shows me exactly where I am on the map.  It easily shows the distance and heading to my destination.  I can enlarge the map enough that I don¡¯t need reading glasses.  It takes a bit of practice to get the hang of it, but it¡¯s a powerful navigation tool, and it just works.  I haven¡¯t had any problems with it.  I love this app.  Highly recommended.
I use this app for tracking cycling training and participating in long distance events.

When this app works it is better than Gaia, but the customer support is pathetic. An update from the past few months broke something and now the app spontaneously stops recording mid track and the breadcrumbs disappear. This happens on two devices in BCNAV but not on Gaia, right when a device is awoken. After a cryptic initial response tech support has been incommunicado for weeks. I am switching to Gaia, despite it being inferior for the moment. It is a pity because the app was worth an annual subscription of a few bucks to me. Instead of realizing a potential revenue stream now they get a one star review.
it puts the world to your feet!

Used to work ok, but now has major issues with greyed out tiles not loading. This is across multiple independant map sources, the exact same sources work perfectly with other map apps: so it's not a case of the map source having issues, or connectivity or storage, neither is it a temporary issue - once an area is greyed out, no amount of future revisits will load the tiles. It's suspicious how just when the developer is moving to a new and expensive monthly subscription model, the original app (one time fee) starts to fail and become buggy.
Since UK Atlas went down. Have been searching for a decent affordable mapping app. This is it! Offline maps downloadable with pro which is recommended. Set maps to Bing for UK OS.

I Liked the demo app so I paid for the Pro app. It worked great for a while but now out of the blue it stopped importing tracks. I've tried everything I can think of and everything I could find on line, but still can't import tracks on the Samsung Tab E that I use in my Jeep. It will work on my other devices but not the one I need it on. I tired to contact Crittermaps, but never got an answer. So it looks like I'm going to have to find a different app.

UPDATE I now have a Nexus 5x. The GPS turn-on is usually immediate, and battery life is extended considerably. AND split-screen enables a direct match between topo and Google maps (which often doesn't show things that are on the topo map), so I can use road navigation to get to my dropped pin. THIS IS AN OUTSTANDING APP.
This is one of the best apps on my phone. The OS map access for the UK and the app software puts it at the top. Download- you won't regret the decision.

Can load multiple map sources and track excursions, plot waypoints, download sections for offline access, and export to Google maps or GIS. Been using this for years and haven't found anything better.
Constantly a superior tool.

When I ride dirt bikes in the desert there is no phone or data service, so I use a Garmin GPS to navigate. However, I use this app to track my routes way points and tracks. I have it on a LG Stylo phone that I throw in my backpack. The phone still picks up the GPS satalites through the backpack material and it is far easier to record information than my Garmin. A cool feature that it has is when you mark a way point you can take a picture of the way point and the app accosiates the picture with the way point

Spend a small amount of time getting to know this app and it will be ENORMOUSLY useful. It works great offline, no cell service needed; you have to choose areas to download onto your device before you go out and use it. You'll also need to turn on your gps antenna (wait until you get there to save power) and you can set the behavior of how often it determines your location to conserve even more battery power if desired.   I find this FAR more useful than the comparatively low-tech handheld gps devices on the market because my smartphone can process all that data way faster than the old chips using tiny amounts of memory in those traditional handheld gps devices. I can get all kinds of different topo maps, overlay boundary data, private property, etc. Very valuable tool for hunting and hiking. I also recommend bringing an extra battery or a power pack for your phone since using the gps antenna constantly will drain your battery.
Any maps downloaded will not load without service I think this app is a gimmick really, and of course I downloaded them in advance you Muppet!
Confusing interface and instructions. Tried 3 times to read and use without success. Not for average GPS user.

Save your money. Unless you have high speed internet everywhere you go including the Deep Backwoods, this is useless. A simple download of a 10 square mile area took 45 minutes to get to 20% and I finally gave up. Going back to my Garmin Rino
Only thing missing is plotting routes ahead of time. Beats my old National Geographic Topo in every other way!
Used app while riding the Washington BDR. Worked great to follow the WaBDR downloaded tracks and the BCN downloaded topo maps without cell service.
Love it! Best GPS I have tried.Works off line.
This app used to be great but now it's not user friendly at all.

Amazing app, we started with the demo and almost immediately bought the full version. Over a year of heavy use every hike and I have never found a problem. The only thing I wish they had was a sharing option!
Very disapointed!!!! Thought this app had great potential so I paid for a premium account but the only map that will load is the free default map.
Excellent app for hiking and cycling.
Best ?10.99 you'll ever spend
It's okay but the price is a little steep. Had to pay an extra 9.99 for BLM land in Colorado. time will tell if this purchase was worth it but so far I'm not really impressed.

The app worked for about a year. Recently the app randomly deleted all of my waypoints. I talked to customer service about it and they said it wasn't a "known bug" and they left it at that and started ignoring me. The app then proceeded to completely die on me and make my phone almost unusable until I ran it in safe mode just to delete this app. I recently tried a reinstall and it's just as broken. When using an SD card the app is impossible to get to load both your saved maps and waypoints all from the same area. Recovering files for the app is NOT user friendly. The overall layout of the app is beyond cluttered and a lot of options could be minimized. I wish I could get a refund for their now defective app but as I said, their customer service started ignoring me. Horrible customer service.

I have been using this app a couple of years now and it works great when I'm out in the wilderness with my horses. However, I do have a suggestion! I wish this app would notify me by sound when I reach a way-point on a trip. I cannot always be looking at my phone to see if we are there yet or not. Otherwise it's a great app!!
Couldn't get it to create a waypoint while on a trip. Sharing trip databases between devices by backing up and raising doesn't work consistently :-(

At least for hunting purposes knowing the year is more important than the day and month. Having a field that would show the date metadata would even be better than having it in the name field. You can tell there is not any hunters in the design team. Still the best program out there there.

Works well on my Samsung A7. Great not having to rely on data link. The new zoom button is great. The new NZTM2000 feature is great. Thank you! Having the tracks list come up on the screen is a handy feature, makes it easier to go back to old tracks. Awesome

I have been useing this app for 3 years and love it dont even use my gps anymore...only problem i ever had was when i got a knew cell but 2 emails to critter maps and they helped me figure it out . ..ps.be sure to download enough tiles with internet before you leave
Can't edit prior track

Love this app, until the most recent update. Getting ready for a week trip, but two nights ago this app updated and my phone began to reboot every few minutes. It  stayed on long enough to uninstall recently updated apps -- once I uninstalled this one, the reboots stopped for the next 24 hours. I tried again today, and while the reboots are less frequent, they're still happening! Please fix. Moto X4 with Android 8.1

Fantastic. Using it in the uk offline with OS maps. Wont do without it as I walk a lot at night.....feel a lot safer with this app. Like anything it takes a bit of learning but is well worth the time.

Went backpacking last year from the western sierra to the eastern sierra mountain range. I used this app the whole time and probably gor nw out of a lot of trouble. Downloaded it nearly 9 years ago for all my backpacking trips.

I've had this app for two years now and it is still the most useful app I 
have on my phone. I have used it to make important decisions while 
backpacking. To mark hunting locations and make sure I havent wandered off 
hunting land. I have used it at work to help mark hiking/mountain biking 
trails for updating maps, locating lost hikers, and other odds and ends 
such as marking things that need repair. Everyone I show this app to is 
impressed by it. Its the real deal.

I have been using BN for a couple years now and I love it. Perfect for what 
I need. I download maps before heading out, and the app offers good GPS 
positioning and many options for tracking and pinning your movements. Best 
hiking navigation app I've tried.

This is the worst mapping app I have ever dealt with. Layers don't work 
correctly. Zoom out and you can see stuff, zoom in and the screen goes 
white. Won't let me download an area for off line use.

Great app that I use almost every day at work as a ranger and in my 
recreational time. Works well in both New Zealand and Canada. Absolutely 
worth the money; little bit of a learning curve if you're new to GPS and 
mapping. Just wish it had a triangulation feature (where one could take 
bearings from different locations to triangulate the position of something) 
maybe could be added to next version or as an add on?
Great. Bought in the sale for 6.99. Can download OS Maps for UK and view offline.

Currently not loading maps in any way on 2018 Samsung J7, nor recording 
tracks.

App seems to work ok. I have used it boating. I'd say not the most 
intuitive app to use, takes some learning.
Works great for hunting!!!!
It's the only thing I need to bring when I go off trail into the wilderness.

Really liked this app. Purchased Pro version and bought bunch of maps. 
Moved to a new phone and can't install it. The new phone is identical to 
previous one (Pixel 2). The app is marked as 'Purchased' in the store. When 
I press 'Install' it pops up 'Buy' window (?!). If I try to buy, I get: 
"Error: You already own this item". :-(

DO NOT use this app. You will lose all of your data when you get a new 
phone or lose your current one. 4 different times I've lost years of data 
stored on the app because they make transferring data impossibly difficult. 
I'm finished for good this time.

Downloaded maps disappear after updates. Nothing worse than arriving at a 
remote locaton to discover your downloaded maps are missing.

Works but it's too complicated, too many options. Why can't I just open a 
gpx file and have an offline version rest for my trips? Also why put a 
button to cancel a recording (with no confirmation) right next to buttons 
that you use all the time during a hike?

Fantastic way to get UK is maps for a reasonable price . Since the Nasty UK 
government sold our tax paid OS data to private companies.

Used this app while off-roading/ backpacking in the Sierra Nevada mountains 
and Santa Cruz mountains.

In the past I would have recommended this app to anyone who does any 
walking/cycling however recently the developer has added spam 
notifications. Instant uninstall.

App started putting spam into notifications, even when not in use. However, 
GPS logging and OS maps is nice. Used to be better before spam....

Will not load UK map, identifying own location brings up a marker on a 
blank screen, demo version and XE version works fine. This is terrible and 
a waste of money to have as an unusable app on my phone.

Great app. Reliable and easy to use. I've used this hundreds of times on 
remote wilderness runs. It's saved me so much time and effort. It's 
probably saved my life a few times.
will not update / why do I need it? worked good untill today.

This is the second time this developer has discontinued one app so they can charge you for another app that does the same thing. No thanks! I can do without any of your apps. Just read the "new" app description and reviews. Doesn't sounds like it's free to me, like your comment says. This is another bait and switch, just like the last time the developer came up with a "new" app and discontinued the old one.

When I purchased this app 4 years ago it was a one time purchase and you were supposed to have it for life. Now your discontinuing it and we have to pay more! That's BS! I think the better business bureau should be notified about the shady s#*t going on here.
I just wish some of the small lakes were charted
Marking and accessing waypoints is way too cumbersome. Having a waypoint button would be very helpful
I like managing the app not the app managing me
A must have for all boaters
Be better if the water depth was accurate
It is tough to use at first but once you learn it it is great.

Just purchased this app.  I am a Navionics fan, but not for this app.   The write up implies it has more features for the price than it does. The app  itself does not state that they are free the first year. it wants you to subscribe for each. It seems everything is an add on. i do not plan to sign up for the options.  Read the print carefully.  Not worth the price for me.  Probably will never use it for navigation or planning a route.

This app is woefully inaccurate for the Fire Island inlet, east to west approach, from can 1 West Channel, EW bouy at East Channel/ West channel intersection westward to inlet. Listen up!!!!!!! The severe shoaling in northern section of bay approach to Robert Moses bridge and shoaling on south side of approach is not shown whatsoever. Imagine you are a new boater, stuck on a shoal and wind driven rollers are pounding your boat as they fill your deck with water--Mayday....Mayday.....Mayday-- A very likely scenario. I have been in calm, glass like water by Kismet and one mile west it is mayhem. Do yourself a favor and Dont waste your money or be conned by the company response I am sure will follow.

For me personally I think you should be a little more liberal with International border Lakes. When fishing Rainy Lake in Minnesota this summer there are some areas you are forced to go through in the Narrows between the east and west side of the lake and also navigating to Kettle Falls etc... using U.S. buoys that are not covered with your Maps because I believe you interpret them as being Canadian Waters. This is dangerous considering the depths and hazards and a huge pain. Had I known this ahead of time I would have gotten the North American package for 5 more dollars which I tried to upgrade to buy paying an additional 5 but was told no. Thanks Nate. Otherwise I like it. Very accurate the two years I've been using it.

Love this app. I had been using it on my android phone then decided to purchase a tablet for better visibility. So glad I did. I have been using it for distance races and transports onboard my sailboat instead of a chart plotter.  It would be nice though if I could program marks from my desktop while I am planning a trip or a race in a new venue. Well worth the subscription!
This app was amazing. Helped us find the sweet spots and stay on the fish! Works without signal too
My go to app for tide and current on cape cod
Having a problem with the App..its not showing my pinned waypoints on the chart

If you are looking for an app to show you the lakes and depth this is the 
one for you. Love and use it each fishing trip.
Best app on my phone

Since last update app keeps saying that I'm in offline modr and that there 
is no internet connection when I'm obviously connected to WiFi. Can't find 
anyway to change it.
Working great again as of 8/9/18

Nice to know, AFTER paying that this app is subscription based, where as it 
used to be a one time thing, how wonderful. I shouldn't of wasted my money.

It was a good app, but the latest update won't allow me to get past the 
terms and agreements.

I've been using this app for a while now. All of a sudden when I launch it 
I cannot get past the Terms of Use acceptance page (Loading... Accept 
...Continue... repeat). Therefore it's totally unusable. Please fix ASAP 
and I'll update to 5 stars, as otherwise it's a great app

Can't get past terms and agreement ??? First time this is happening to me 
and I've been using this app for years... wth is going on??

This is a good app with some serious safety flaws. When using the 
sonarchart live function, it will ask for tide station confirmation 
enroute, but when it does this is completely changes your zoom and 
orientation. If you are not constantly watching it, your map zoom and 
orientation can change unexpectedly and when you need it, it's all out of 
whack. I use course up at a 500ft zoom, but it reverts to north up on a 
several mile zoom. Pop up a notification but don't mess with what I have 
setup as ideal for my situation. I want to set my parameters at the dock 
and have them stay put.

I have had at least one version since it has come out. Very pleased and 
have probably sold about 50 boaters on buying....well worth it and seams to 
be more accurate than my mounted Garmin. A must have!
Works great! Easy to use and I love the routing feature.

There is no reason that Garmin / Navionics should require a user to allow access to making phone calls. I would have never purchased this if I had known that It would REQUIRE access to making phone calls. I agree with others that is BS!

One constant issue with the app that they refuse to fix. Sailors almost 
unanimously prefer to have their charts and all other instruments all 
displayed with magnetic bearing and course information to avoid any 
problems doing the math on the fly when referring to the actual compass. 
Until Navionics stops acting like they know better than the people using 
the app, I can't give it anything more than a 2.... Add magnetic bearing 
option like every other chart plotter software in existence and I'll be 
happy. REPLY TO NAVIONICS RESPONSE: Yes of course magnetic deviation 
changes over time, yet when they can still print it on paper charts and 
know how accurate it is, your excuse carries no weight, especially when all 
other chart water software in the Marine industry has the ability to 
compensate for magnetic drift

This app has FAILED every time I tried to use it. It left me stranded twice 
while on the water, showing my position as 50 miles inland..... THIS APP 
SUCKS

Works great. Downloaded on tablet and have 10" screen. Works just as good 
as high dollar gps.

App is pretty great for figuring out where to go. But the main reason I got 
it was the navigation feature. I do a lot of boating in shallow waters and 
this app was intended to get me around problem areas. Well, the navigation 
gets really jittery unless you have the map in true north-south. I prefer 
the map setting where the arrow is constantly aiming in the direction you 
are heading and map rotates around you. This feature is unfortunately 
fairly consistent in turning all over the place making navigation a pain.

I have used this app since 2011. Now they want more money. It's not going to happen. Lots of other great FREE apps, I don't need to pay for this one over and over.  I called in (when you still displayed a phone #) and was told that I would be grandfathered in, now they are going back on their word. Very dishonorable.
